page.title: 02SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: In the Wilmslow /Alderley /Mottram area the residents are mainly concerned with helping the {handicapped}and{disabled}and the prevention of{vandalism}and{crime.} In the Wilmslow district there is an active society known as{The Council {for Voluntary Service.}Amongst the many services they offer are social clubs & swimming for the{partially {sighted.}They also run a{talking {newspaper}and a{victim support scheme. There are several homes for the disabled & the handicapped, run by local councils and well supported by members of the voluntary service. Cheshire County Council have recently introduced{concessionary fares}on buses.This allows the disabled in the area to travel at half price.
